content.prompt: A state highway was constructed over wetlands. The state obtained a permit to fill the existing wetlands in accordance with the provisions of the Clean Water Act in 1972, and agreed to create another wetland. This trade-off approach to addressing an environmental issue is known as

topic.text: 8.4: Human Impacts on Wetlands and Mangroves

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
